rates of
				completion of the first year at an institution of higher education.

establish a

appoint

				are familiar with educational standards, assessments, accountability, the needs
				of low-performing schools, and other educational needs of students;
if the

not decline to
				approve a State's accountability model plan before—

offering the
				State an opportunity to revise its accountability model plan;

providing a
				hearing; and

allowing the
				State to communicate with peer reviewers in order to further explain or justify
				the merits of the State's accountability model plan; and

have the
				authority to disapprove a State accountability model plan for not meeting the
				requirements of this paragraph, but shall not have the authority to require a
				State, as a condition of approval of the State accountability model plan, to
				include in, or delete from, such plan 1 or more specific elements of the
				State's academic content standards or to use specific academic assessment
				instruments or items.
